knimeNode.name: Document Data Assigner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns meta information to existing documents.

fullDescription.intro: The Document Data Assigner adds meta information like authors, source, category, type and publication date to documents of an incoming document column that can be defined in the node dialog. The meta information can be set directly in the node dialog for all cells of the document column. It is possible to use other columns to get the information from. The new document column can be appended or replaces the old one. This node can be used inside of a streamable wrapped meta node.
fullDescription.option: If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as author(s).
The string separating the author names while processing the authors column.
The default authors first name. It is set to all documents if "Use authors from column" is unchecked, but will not be set if the string remains "-" or is empty.
The default authors first name. It is set to all documents if "Use authors from column" is unchecked, but will not be set if the string remains "-" or is empty.
The source which is set to all documents (if "Use sources from column" is unchecked).
If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as document sources.
The column containing the string used as source. No source is set for missing values.
The category which is set to all documents (if "Use categories from column" unchecked).
If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as document categories.
The column containing the string used as category. No category is set for missing values.
The type which is set to all documents.

The publication date which is set to all documents (if "Use publication date from column" is not checked). The date has to be formatted like "dd-mm-yyy". Two digits to specify the day, two to specify the month and four to specify the year. The specified date has to be a valid date.
If checked, the string value of the specified column will be used as document publication date.

The column containing the string which is used as publication date. (if "Use publication date from column" is checked, otherwise the current date from "Publication date" field is set as date). The date has to be formatted like "dd-mm-yyy".
If checked, the incoming document column will be replaced by the processed document column. Otherwise, the new document column will be appended.
The number of threads used to process the documents.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains documents to process and optionally string columns containing the meta information.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the additional data column.
